results.title: Effect of Simvastatin Treatment on "In Vitro" NLRP1 Inflammasome Expression in Peripheral Arterial Disease.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, HAECs exposed to the plasma of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Limb_Threatening_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000089802 @@@critical limb ischemia@@@ and treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ responded with a higher @GENE_NLRP1 @GENE_22861 @@@NLRP1@@@ expression than those exposed to the plasma of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Intermittent_Claudication @DISEASE_MESH:D007383 @@@claudication@@@ (RQ 1.1 +- 0.3 vs. 0.99 +- 0.14, P < 0.001).

citations.NLM: Bleda S, de Haro J, Lopez de Maturana I, Varela C, Ferruelo A, Acin F. Effect of Simvastatin Treatment on "In Vitro" NLRP1 Inflammasome Expression in Peripheral Arterial Disease. Ann Vasc Surg. 2016 Oct;36():260-264. PMID: 27423725
